lines: U Tswariwe Xidyelweni Tshangeni; :S: Swa Hlamarisa Nkateko Lowu! U Ndzi Lave Mina (Fine) U Ndzi Lave Mina (Mina)
U Ndzi Xava Hi Nxavo Wongasi; :S: Swa Hlamarisa Leswendlekeke, U Ndzi Fele Mina! (Fine) U Ndzi Fele Mina! (Mina)!
3. Yesu I Muponisi Wa Khale, Loko Ndza Ha Sukile Ntlhambini;
:S: Hi Malwandla A Ndzi Khongotela, U Ndzi Vite Mina! (Fine) U Ndzi Vite Mina (Mina)!
Ku Nandziha Ka Xo Xitshembhiso; :S: Loko Minkarhi Yi Ri Ku Hundzen, U Ndzi Tele Mina! (Fine) U Ndzi Tele Mina (Mina)!
